channel.title: My computer freezes when i start workstation on the virtualbox
channel.description:
hi everybody, english is not my native language. i got this problem. i already downloaded virtual box and whonix. first i got a problem because i couldnt get into uefi. a guy told me if you dont have uefi, you probable have bios. then i went to bios and enabled the virtualization. everything was fine then.
i started the gateway and it worked ok. but then when i start the workstation, my screen freezes and i cant use the keyboard or the mouse.
my pc have an Inter(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU 540 @3.07GHz 3.07GHZ 4.00GB of ram windows 10
can you tell me whats happenin? 4gb ram is not enough maybe?? thanks in advanced

item.title: My computer freezes when i start workstation on the virtualbox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 24 Dec 20

Whonix ™ in VirtualBox - Troubleshooting - Whonix ™ does not Start?

VT-x is disabled in the BIOS. / VERR_VMX_MSR_VMXON_DISABLED / VERR_SSM_FIELD_NOT_CONSECUTIVE / supR3HardenedWinReSpawn / Enable VT-x in BIOS / Aborted Status / Guru Mediation

Whonix – 28 Dec 20

Advice for Systems with Low RAM

How to use Whonix ™ with 4 GB RAM or less RAM.

Read full topic
item.source: My computer freezes when i start workstation on the virtualbox

item.title: My computer freezes when i start workstation on the virtualbox
item.dc:creator: andramz
item.description:
hi everybody, english is not my native language. i got this problem. i already downloaded virtual box and whonix. first i got a problem because i couldnt get into uefi. a guy told me if you dont have uefi, you probable have bios. then i went to bios and enabled the virtualization. everything was fine then.

i started the gateway and it worked ok. but then when i start the workstation, my screen freezes and i cant use the keyboard or the mouse.

my pc have an Inter® Core™ i3 CPU 540 @3.07GHz 3.07GHZ
4.00GB of ram
windows 10

can you tell me whats happenin? 4gb ram is not enough maybe?? thanks in advanced
